select sri.id, sri.commodity_code, sri.num, sri.`type`, sri.order_number, sri.price, sri.total_price, sri.create_date, ci.name, ci.model, ci.unit, ci.images, ct.name as typeName from store_record_info sri left join commodity_info ci on (ci.code = sri.commodity_code) left join commodity_type ct on (ct.id = ci.type_id) where 1 = 1
AND sri.type = #{storeRecordInfo.type}
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeRecordInfo.name},'%')
AND ci.model LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeRecordInfo.model},'%')
order by sri.create_date desc
